version_description:
* New: Sizing the circuit breaker
* New: Calculation of power factor
* New: Max wire length
* New: Appliance classes
* New: Plug & socket types
* New: IEC 60320 connectors
* New: iPad compatibility
* Add: Pinout PCI Express power cable (into Molex section)
* Add: Portuguese (BR) language (by José Machacaz, Moacir Carvalho, Paulo Pepeleascov, Antonio Fraga, Julio Cesar Stempkowski)
* Add: Croatian language (by Pero Razović)
* Add: Serbian (latin) language (by Saša Fišić, Vladimir Cvijović, Velimir Lazarević, Miloš Stevanović)
* Upd: Czech language (by Skipy)
* Upd: Polish language (by Kacper Szuba)
* Upd: Portuguese [PT] language (by Leandro Sousa)
* Upd: Turkish language (by Bekir Aydogdu)
* Imp: Improved some layouts
* Fix: Conversion from MegaGauss or KiloGauss
* Fix: Improved rounding of "Conversion pressure"
* Fix: Bug max voltage drop 0%
* Add: Adv

* New: Sizing the circuit breaker
* New: Calculation of power factor

* Fix: Conversion from MegaGauss or KiloGauss
* Fix: Improved rounding of "Conversion pressure"
* Fix: Bug max voltage drop 0%
* Add: Adv

* Add: Search bar
* Add: Improved "Sum resistors" with Ω, kΩ, MΩ
* Add: Improved "Sum capacitors" with pF, nF, µF
* Add: Socket type F to Guinea Bissau
* Add: Socket type C and F to Western Sahara
* Fix: Formula tanφ = Q / P

* Add: Choice unipolar/multipolar cable into the "Calculation of voltage drop", "Max wire size" and "Short-circuit current"

* Fix: String 150 mm² into the "Table of unitary voltage drop"

* Imp: Short circuit current with transformer substation
* Imp: Power factor correction
* Mod: Calculations "Power factor correction" and "Power factor correction small loads" have been merged
* Add: Number of neutral conductors in parallel in the short-circuit current calculation
* Add: Choice φ in radians or degrees in "Calculation of reactive power"
* Add: kVA and kVAr to "Calculation of power factor"
* Add: Dutch language (by Ilyahoo Proshel, Robert Wintersteijn, Felipe Espitia)

* Imp: Short circuit current with transformer substation

* Add: Number of neutral conductors in parallel in the short-circuit current calculation
* Add: Choice φ in radians or degrees in "Calculation of reactive power"
* Add: kVA and kVAr to "Calculation of power factor"
* Add: Dutch language (by Ilyahoo Proshel, Robert Wintersteijn, Felipe Espitia)
